title: LinkedLists
text:
ListNode

 ListNode (val:int, next=None)

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.




Type
Default
Details




val
int

Value of the node


next
NoneType
None
Pointer to the next node






make_linked_list

 make_linked_list (lst)

This function takes in a list of integers and returns a head ptr of linked list ListNode

ll = make_linked_list([1,2,1,2,1,3])


print(ll)

1-->2-->1-->2-->1-->3-->





reverse_linked_list

 reverse_linked_list (ll:__main__.ListNode)

For a given linked list, reverse the list and return itâ€™s head pointer

ll = make_linked_list([1,2,3])
print(ll)

1-->2-->3-->



reverse_linked_list(ll)

3-->2-->1-->





make_random_linked_list

 make_random_linked_list (size:int=None)

Make a random linked list of size [1-1000]




Type
Default
Details




size
int
None
You can specify the size if you want




make_random_linked_list(10)

436637-->921775-->989828-->632712-->801120-->362495-->1153-->636032-->586361-->800895-->
